description: Your trusted companion on technical terrain, offering improved support and better grip with a redesigned vibram® sole. For an optimum sure-footed step on day hikes or multi-day tours carrying a heavy load. Waterproof thanks to a GORE-TEX membrane. The sustainably produced terracare® nubuck leather, tanned in an environmentally friendly process, gives the shoe a comfortable fit. The elastic GORE-TEX tongue construction and memo foam provide additional comfort. Materials and components are 100% made in Europe. A classic hiking boot in a modern design.
name: Mammut Trovat Tour High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
Sliding webbing transfers power from lacing area to soles, ensuring improved hold in boot to increase safety and comfort
